solution_line_template: There are {total_slices} pieces of pizza because {large_pizza_slices} plus {small_pizza_slices} equals <<{large_pizza_slices}+{small_pizza_slices}={total_slices}>>{total_slices}.

They have eaten {total_eaten_slices} pieces of pizza because {slices_eaten_per_person} plus {slices_eaten_per_person} equals <<{slices_eaten_per_person}+{slices_eaten_per_person}={total_eaten_slices}>>{total_eaten_slices}.
There are {remaining_slices} pieces of pizza left because {total_slices} minus {total_eaten_slices} equals <<{total_slices}-{total_eaten_slices}={remaining_slices}>>{remaining_slices}.
There are {pieces_per_person} pieces per person because {remaining_slices} divided by {number_of_people} equals <<{remaining_slices}/{number_of_people}={pieces_per_person}>>{pieces_per_person}.
